```{r}
set.seed(1)
# define parameters
pos <- seq(1,1e3,1e2)
K <- 50
m <- 0.5
rho <- 1e-4 
mean_coi <- 5e2
tlim = 1e5

start <- Sys.time()
swf <- sim_structured_WF(pos = pos,
                         K = K, 
                         m = m,
                         rho = rho, 
                         mean_coi = mean_coi,
                         tlim = tlim
                         )
```
